allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add one-click installer and update installation docs

- Add install.sh with auto-detection for Claude Code/Codex CLI
- Update README with multiple installation methods
- Add verification and update instructions
- Improve user onboarding experience

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix install script: resolve HOME variable issue

- Remove detect_agent\(\) function to fix variable scope issue
- Add HOME fallback if environment variable is not set
- Simplify agent detection logic
- Ensure SKILLS_DIR is properly set before use

This fixes the "No such file or directory" error when running
the installer.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: 新增完整頁面規格文件 \(41 頁\)

- 建立 doc/specs/ 目錄結構，對應 RoutesCatalog 功能模組
- Public: login, trial, enrollment, qr-checkin \(4 頁\)
- Admin: dashboard, tasks, calendar, notifications + 5 子模組 \(20 頁\)
  - academic/: courses, classes, schedule, sessions, changes
  - student-affairs/: students, parents, attendance, leave, grades
  - enrollment/: trials, enrollment-requests, enrollment, renewals
  - finance/: fee-templates, meals, payments, reports
  - system/: staff, campuses, settings
- Teacher: dashboard, notifications, schedule, attendance, students, assessments \(6 頁\)
- Parent: dashboard, notifications, schedule, attendance, grades, trial, enrollment, add-course, renewal, meals, payments \(11 頁\)
- PRD.md: 統一路由路徑為 /admin（移除 /staff, /manager）

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
